name: Lizard Person Dating Sim
description:
The year is 2073... You’re an awkward queer Jewish woman named Lex who hasn’t been on a date in six months. Enjoy a cute coffee date with a very sweet lizard person named Wren!

  • Talk about your embarrassing Bat Mitzvah theme!
  • Commiserate about how awkward first dates are!
  • Why doesn't this coffee shop have skim milk! 

Created by Alexa Derman

Character Art by Isabel J Kim

Background Art by Tani Jackson

Music by Miles Walter

Supported with funds from the Brown Arts Institute. Made with Ren'py.
